name: Miramar By Windsor Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlantica, 3668 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking, as pricing is dynamic, we will get back to you straight away. HeadLine: Near Copacabana FortLocation: With a stay at Miramar Hotel by Windsor in Rio de Janeiro (Copacabana), you ll be steps from Copacabana Beach and Avenida Atlantica. This 5-star hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Copacabana Fort and 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Arpoador Beach.Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 200 guestrooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Dining: Enjoy Italian cuisine at Alloro al Miramar, a beachfront restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. name: Mar Palace Copacabana Hotel
address: Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, 552, Rio de Janeiro 22020-000
description: Located 230 metres from the trendy Copacabana Beach, Mar Palace Copacabana Hotel offers accommodation in Rio de Janeiro. Free WiFi is available. Guests will find a swimming pool, as well as panoramic views of the Corcovado and the Christ Statue. A complimentary breakfast is served daily. This 4-star hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with 32" cable TV. Bathroom is fitted with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Inside the Mar Palace Copacabana, guests will also find a restaurant, a business center and a couple of computers with internet access. Siqueira Campos metro station is 500 metres from Mar Palace, whilst Lagoa Stadium is 4.8 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 8 km and Galeão International Airport is 24.8 km from the property.Read less

name: Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel & Resort
address: Avenida Niemeyer 121 - Leblon, Rio de Janeiro 22450-220
description: Located near the beaches of Rio de Janeiro Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel and Resort offers one of the only beachfront resorts with an extensive recreational area, hotel spa and other amenities. Find us tucked between trendy Barra da Tijuca and famed Ipanema Beach. Our full-service luxury resort offers extensive business facilities in a tropical setting. Take our complimentary shuttle to nearby Leblon Beach and its upscale shopping mall. Stroll our resort's lush, landscaped grounds, set on a white-sand beach facing the tropical South Atlantic, flanked by Brazils towering mountains. Each of the 538 hotel rooms and suites at our Rio de Janeiro resort include Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds, as well as private balconies with partial or full ocean views. Reserve a club-level accommodation for complimentary access to the Sheraton Club Lounge and a private area for breakfast.MarriottRead less

name: Arena Copacabana Hotel
address: Av Atlantica 2064 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22040-010
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. Across the street from Copacabana Beach, this modern hotel is a 7-minute walk from a metro station and 15 km from the Christ the Redeemer statue.The streamlined rooms come with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus minifridges and desks. Upgraded rooms feature sea views, while suites add separate living spaces. Room service is available.A breakfast buffet is complimentary. There's a casual restaurant with floor-to-ceiling windows, along with a lobby bar. Other amenities include a rooftop pool, a fitness room and a sauna. Free Wi-FiBreakfastAccessibleOutdoor poolAir-conditionedLaundry service Avenida Atlantica, 2064, Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, CEP 22040-010, BrazilVRBORead less

name: Hilton Copacabana Rio de Janeiro
address: Avenida Atlantica, 1020, Rio de Janeiro 22010-000
description: The 5-star Hilton Rio de Janeiro Copacabana is ideally located across from the blue waters of Copacabana Beach. It features an elegant spa and a rooftop pool, both with splendid sea views. Hilton Rio de Janeiro Copacabana offers bright, sophisticated rooms with air conditioning, a TV and a minibar. They are elegantly styled with wooden furniture, contemporary decor and warm, natural tones. Most rooms feature amazing ocean views. A popular buffet breakfast is served every morning with fresh fruits and pastries. The spa at the hotel has a variety of treatments, and there is a second swimming pool on the 4th floor, where guests can find the hotel restaurant. They are also welcome to exercise or have a sauna session in the fitness centre. Charming shops, restaurants and lively bars are found just 2 blocks away from this hotel. Copacabana Fort is 3.2 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 9.6 km away, while GaleÃ£o International Airport is at a distance of 27.6 km.Read less

name: Pestana Rio Atlântica
address: Avenida Atlantica 2964, Rio de Janeiro 22070-000
description: Situated on Copacabana's beachfront, Pestana Rio Atlantica offers modern, luxurious suites and various leisure and gastronomic options. The rooftop pool and lounge bar offers panoramic ocean views and sophisticated cocktails. Free WiFi is also available. Each of the rooms is fitted with a private balcony with city views, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. Some suites also include a spa bath. Guests can sample fine Portuguese cuisine at the restaurant. A breakfast with buttered croissants and juices is served on the restaurant. Pestana Rio Atlantica is conveniently situated 8 km from Santos Dumont Airport and 20 km from Galeao Airport. Christ the Redeemer Statue is 4 km away, while Copacabana Fort is 1.6 km from the property.Read less

name: Novotel Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca
address: Avenida Lucio Costa 5210, Rio de Janeiro 22630012
description: Looking for a well-deserved rest? Novotel Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca is available! Cozy rooms for couples, singles and families. Overlooking the sea, with A/C and WiFi. The Restaurant 365 serves international cuisine, plus Brazilian food and drinks at the bar. Use our meeting rooms for events. Relax in the swimming pool and gym, plus a kids space and ironing room. Your pet is welcome for a fee.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Rio Aeroporto Hotel
address: Av. Vinte de Janeiro 3 Andar Tps, Rio de Janeiro
description: Offering a restaurant and a fitness centre, Rio Aeroporto Hotel Galeão is located on the 3rd floor of Antonio Carlos Jobim International Airport (Terminal 1). Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a cable TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and a bidet and free toiletries. At Rio Aeroporto Hotel Galeão you will find a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities and luggage storage. We have adapted rooms in the Quadruple Room category The hotel is 24 km from Copacabana Beach and Sugarloaf Mountain. Christ the Redeemer Statue is 22 km away, and Novo Rio Bus Station is at a distance of 13.3 km.Read less

name: Les Jardins de Rio Boutique Hotel
address: Rua Cosme Velho 1342, Rio de Janeiro 22241-091
description: Set 350 metres from Rio de Janeiro's Corcovado and 7 km from Maracanã Stadium, Les Jardins Rio offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi. The guesthouse offers modern décor and furnishing, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The private bathroom is fitted with bathrobes and free toiletries. At Les Jardins de Rio, guests can benefit from meeting facilities. The guest house is 1.2 km from Christ the Redeemer, 2.3 km from Complex of Sports of Fluminense Football Club and 2.4 km from the General Consulate of Germany. Galeão International Airport is 15 km away.Read less

name: Hmg Suites Inn Budget Rio
address: Rua São Clemente, 23, 1st Floor, Rio de Janeiro 22260-001
description: Right across Botafogo Beach, HMG Rio Suítes offers accommodations in Rio de Janeiro. The property features an on-site bar and WiFi throughout the property, free of charge. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and contain either a shared or a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast and can also benefit from a TV room and a 24-hour front desk. Additional services include laundry and locker rental. Christ the Redeemer monument is located 3 km from HMG Rio Suítes, while Sugarloaf Mount is within a distance of 1.5 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont International Airport, 8 km from HMG Rio Suítes.Read less

name: Santa Teresa Hotel RJ - MGallery
address: Rua Almirante Alexandrino 660, Rio de Janeiro 20241-260
description: Santa Teresa MGallery is a boutique hotel that blends rustic with luxury and sophistication. The bedrooms and suites are spacious and decorated, with air-conditioned, free WIFI, options for reduced mobility, and a beautiful view. The Térèze restaurant offers the best of local cuisine, and the Bar dos Descasados serves drinks. Enjoy the pool and Le Spa, and make your event at La Villa.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Ipanema Inn
address: Rua Maria Quiteria 27, Rio de Janeiro 22410-001
description: This hotel has an unbeatable location only 130 metres from trendy Ipanema Beach, and 180 metres from Nossa Senhora da Paz Train Station. It offers car rental, WiFi and room service. All rooms at Ipanema Inn offer air conditioning, cable TV and a minibar. A breakfast with croissants, natural juices and fresh cakes is served daily, and may be requested in room. The restaurant and bar serves regional specialties and exotic caipirinhas. Copacabana Fort is 2.2 km from the Ipanema Inn Hotel whilst Lagoa Stadium is 3.3 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 13.6 km, while Galeão International Airport is 27.1 km away.Read less

name: Fairmont Rio de Janeiro Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlântica, 4240 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22070-002
description: Experience a unique stay at Fairmont Rio de Janeiro Copacabana for business or leisure. Enjoy the spa, sauna, massage and beauty salon services at the Fairmont SPA, including an infinity pool. The hotel has a mixology bar and restaurant specialized in seafood, plus meeting and event rooms, including beautiful panoramic view of Rio de Janeiro.accorhotels.comRead less

name: La Suite by Dussol
address: Rua Jackson De Figueiredo 501, Rio de Janeiro
description: La Suite by Dussol is a charming guesthouse which boasts an exquisite infinite pool and is finely decorated. Guests can enjoy a wellness centre, as well as taste the recipes at the guesthouse´s a la carte restaurant. Wi-Fi connection is free. Some of the charming rooms at La Suite features a balcony and a king size bed. They are air conditioned and come with a king size bed, wardrobe, Ipod docking station and private bathrooms. Selected units boasts scenic sea views. Spa facilities include massages and esthetic treatments. The guest house is 17 km from Riocentro Convention Centre, 10 km from Leblon Beach and 24 km from Maracanã Stadium. Santos Dumont Airport is 25 km away. The property offers parking in a location nearby at an extra cost.Read less

Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while DVD players and cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Dining: Grab a bite at Cipriani, one of the hotel s 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. name: Hotel Fasano Rio De Janeiro
address: Avenida Vieira Souto 80, Rio de Janeiro 22420-000
description: Boasting a rooftop pool with stunning sea views, Hotel Fasano Rio de Janeiro offers luxurious beachfront accommodations on Ipanema Beach. The property also offers a spa and wellness centre. Elegantly decorated, rooms at this 5-star hotel feature a balcony, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bath or shower. The spacious rooms also offer hardwood floors and high quality wood and leather furniture. At Rio de Janeiro's Hotel Fasano guests can enjoy the distinguished Gero Rio Restaurant, renowned for its contemporary Italian cuisine. The property is also conveniently located within a 5-minute walk from restaurants serving local and international dishes. After a relaxing visit to the sauna, guests can exercise in the well-appointed fitness centre or enjoy a refreshing drink from the bar. The property also offers massages, a terrace, concierge service, a solarium and a nightclub. Copacabana Fort is 1 km from Fasano Rio de Janeiro whilst Lagoa Stadium is 4 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 11 km, while Galeão International Airport is 27.8 km away.Read less

name: Emiliano Rio
address: Av. Atlântica, 3804, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Boasting an outdoor infinity pool, Emiliano Rio is set in a privileged location in Rio de Janeiro, beachfront to Copacabana Beach. The contemporary architecture values the natural light and the sea view, offering guests a special and unique connection with the city. Free WiFi is provided, and private parking is available on site. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. Some rooms have a seating area for guests' convenience. Every room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet, with bathrobes provided. It is also fitted with slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Emiliano Rio, guests can taste a contemporary Brazilian cuisine made from organic products at the on-site restaurant. Other hotel facilities include a spa where guests can relax and a fitness centre where they can exercise. The rooftop boasts a swimming pool and views to the beach. Ipanema Beach is 1.2 km from Emiliano Rio, while the famous Sugarloaf Mountain is 7.5 km away, and Christ The Redeemer is at a distance of 8.4 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from the property, while Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

name: L'Homme de Rio Boutique Hotel
address: Rua Saint Roman 222, Rio de Janeiro 22071-060
description: L'Homme de Rio Boutique Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and bar in Rio de Janeiro. The property is located 3.8 km from Rodrigo de Freitas Lake, 6 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens and 7.5 km from Sugarloaf Mountain. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, all rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at L'Homme de Rio Boutique Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. L'Homme de Rio Boutique Hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Copacabana Beach, Arpoador Beach and Ipanema Beach. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 12 km from L'Homme de Rio Boutique Hotel.Read less

name: Injoy Lofts Ipanema
address: Rua Joana Angélica 247, Rio de Janeiro 22420-030
description: Injoy Lofts Ipanema is an apartment set in Rio de Janeiro, 700 metres from Ipanema Beach. Free WiFi is featured. The accommodation is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with a microwave, cooktop and fridge. The apartment also has a private bathroom with free toiletries. Bed linen is provided. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from Injoy Lofts Ipanema.Read less

name: Maraca Hostel
address: Rua Ribeiro Guimaraes, 367, Rio de Janeiro 20511-070
description: Maraca Hostel is located 800 metres from Rio de Janeiro’s Maracanã Stadium, offering shared and private accommodation, a pool, a shared kitchen, and free Wi-Fi. Santos Dumont Airport is 10 km away. Each room and dormitory is air-conditioned and provides linens and storage in lockers or wardrobes. There is a double room available with a private or shared bathroom. The football-themed hostel is within 16 km of the Sugar Loaf and Christ Redeemer, as well as Ipanema, Copacabana and the Sambadrome. The closest metro station is Saens Peña, 1 km away.Read less

name: Laghetto Stilo Barra Rio
address: R. Marcelo Roberto, 65, Rio de Janeiro 22630-190
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, a fitness centre and a business centre, Laghetto Stilo Barra is a beach front hotel loctated on Rio de Janeiro's Barra da Tijuca Beach. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. Free WiFi is available troughout the property. The modern decorated rooms all include air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Laghetto Stilo Barra has a 24-hour front desk and private parking is available on site. Tijuca Forest National Park is 11 km from Laghetto Barra Rio, while Post 12 - Leblon is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 22 km from Laghetto Stilo Barra.Read less

name: Longboard Paradise Suítes
address: Av. Paulo Tapajós 632, Rio de Janeiro 22795-740
description: Situated in Rio de Janeiro, Longboard Paradise Suítes offers beachfront accommodation 90 metres from Pontal Beach and features various facilities, such as a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is around 500 metres from Macumba Beach, 700 metres from Recreio dos Bandeirantes and 32 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. À la carte and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the hostel. There is an in-house snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 34 km from Longboard Paradise Suítes, while Tijuca Forest National Park is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.Read less

name: Lifestyle Laghetto Collection
address: Rua Professor Coutinho Frois, 10, Rio de Janeiro 22620-360
description: Located in a privileged place, just in front of Barra da Tijuca Beach, Lifestyle Laghetto Collection offers fine and elegant accommodation in Rio de Janeiro city. The hotel features an infinity pool boasting an amazing ocean view and a bar where guests can enjoy a drink. Free WiFi is available in public areas. All rooms at Lifestyle Laghetto Collection feature a balcony, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A bath is offered in certain rooms. The private bathroom is fitted with an walk in shower and a hairdryer. A 24-hour front desk is also offered. Village Mall ia 5 km from the hotel, while Jardim Oceânico Metro Station is 1.4 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 25 km from the Lifestyle Laghetto Collection.Read less

name: Tuakaza Exclusive Boutique Lodge
address: São Conrado
description: No description found

name: Grand Mercure Rio de Janeiro Copacabana
address: Rua Souza Lima, 48, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Rediscover the uniqueness of Brazilian culture by staying at Grand Mercure RJ Copacabana. The hotel environment close to the beach will mesmerize you with elegance and Brazilian vibe. Enjoy large and comfortable rooms, plus a leisure structure complete with gym, sauna and beach service. Start your days with a delicious hearty breakfast, freshly and specially made for your well-being and health.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Rio Othon Palace
address: Avenida Atlantica 3264, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Located beachfront to Copacabana beach, Rio Othon Palace features a rooftop pool with excellent views of the Sugarloaf Mountain and an on-site fitness centre. Boasting panoramic sea views, breakfast is served on the 3rd floor. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the property. Each of the air-conditioned accommodations at Rio Othon Palace has a balcony, cable TV and minibar. Some offer views of the sea and a separate seating area. Parking is provided on site, subject to availability. At the Skylab Restaurant and Bar, located on the 30th floor, guests can taste Brazilian and international cuisine, as well as a tradicional 'feijoada' every Saturday. There are a number of shops and restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. Cantagalo metro station is 450 metres from Rio Othon Palace, whilst Copacabana Fort is 1 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 11 km and Galeão International Airport is 23.8 km from the property.Read less

name: Wyndham Rio de Janeiro Barra
address: Avenida Lucio Costa 3150, Rio de Janeiro
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 292 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with microwaves and espresso makers. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 5 outdoor swimming pools, 2 spa tubs, and a health club. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Rio de Janeiro? This hotel has facilities measuring 4306 square feet (400 square meters), including conference space. Property Location With a stay at Wyndham Rio de Janeiro Barra in Rio de Janeiro (Barra da Tijuca), you'll be a 2-minute drive from Pepe Beach and 5 minutes from Barra Shopping Mall. This 4-star hotel is 6.9 mi (11.1 km) from Recreio dos Bandeirantes Beach and 9.1 mi (14.6 km) from RioCentro Convention Center. Dining Enjoy local and international cuisine at Dom Rio, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. name: Savoy Othon
address: Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana 995, Rio de Janeiro 22060-001
description: Located 230 metres from Copacabana Beach, the Savoy Othon Hotel is ideal for those wishing to stay in the heart of the lively Copacabana area. Free WiFi is available. In addition to the vibrant Copacabana Beach, there are also excellent shops, cafes and restaurants, and nightlife surrounding the hotel. The iconic Sugar Loaf Mountain and the Christ the Redeemer Statue at Corcovado are easy to reach. Furthermore, guests can walk along the coast to reach the nearby Ipanema and Leblon beaches. The guestrooms are tastefully furnished in contemporary style. Broadband internet access is available in the rooms for an additional cost. The multilingual and knowledgeable staff are available 24 hours a day with suggestions and recommendations to help you get the most out of your stay in Rio. At a charge, private parking is available in a location nearby. Copacabana Fort is 1.4 km from Savoy Othon. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 9.4 km, while Galeão International Airport is 26.2 km away.Read less

name: Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro
address: Av. Lucio Costa 9600, Rio de Janeiro 22795-007
description: Boasting an out-door pool and a spa, Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro is located in the heart of Barra da Tijuca, between the ocean, the lake and the mountains, just across the street from Reserva Beach. The hotel has a sauna and a fitness centre with a yoga studio. Guests can enjoy a meal at one of the three restaurants. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and offers a furnished balcony. Rooms also offer a bathtub, bathroom amenities and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and shops at the property. Beach service is available and offers chairs, parasols and towels. The spa offers different massages and treatments in its nine private suites. The spa also has locker rooms with saunas and steam rooms. Guests can also enjoy several resort activities such as daily physical activities, cocktail tasting, bike experience and welcome drinks at the restaurant, for an additional charge. Children can enjoy several toys, books, artistic activities, baby area and video games at our kids club. Jeunesse Arena is located nearby, whilst Cidade das Artes is 3.2 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 26 km from Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro.Read less

name: Novotel Rio de Janeiro Santos Dumont
address: Avenida Rua Marechal Camara 300, Rio de Janeiro 20020-080
description: Just 400 meters from Santos Dumont Airport, Novotel RJ Santos Dumont has large, functional apartments with SmartTV, WiFi, sauna, plus event lounge and fitness center. The restaurant serves the best quality regional cuisine, or relax at the IT'S TIME bar for drinks, snacks and special coffees. Ideal for business or family, the hotel offers a complete infrastructure of comfort and well being.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Rio de Janeiro Ribalta
address: 9650 Avenida Das Americas, Rio de Janeiro 22793
description: Thank you for choosing our Ramada hotel. Ramada is a global upper midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless highspeed internet access meeting rooms business services fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an onsite restaurant and lounge while other sites offer a complimentary continental breakfast. You do your thing leave the rest to us.WyndhamRead less

name: Hotel Casa Bonita
address: Rua Major Armando De Sousa Melo 257, Rio de Janeiro 23055-536
description: Featuring mountain views, Hotel Casa Bonita is set in Campo Grande, around 48 km from Maracanã Stadium. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 2015, you will have access to free WiFi. The apartment features family rooms. Fitted with a terrace, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International, 48 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Read less

name: Cliffside - Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: Escada Flora Mai, 177, Rio de Janeiro 22611-120
description: Featuring pool views, CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a bar, barbecue facilities and a shared lounge, around 300 metres from Joatinga Beach. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The restaurant serves African and American dishes, as well as Argentinian and Brazilian cuisine. Providing a terrace, some units are air conditioned and include a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with sea views and an outdoor dining area. At the homestay, some units are allergy-free. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. Guests can make the most of the garden, pool with a view and yoga classes on offer at the homestay. Bike hire and car hire are available at CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa and the area is popular for cycling and pub crawls. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the accommodation. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 13 km from CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont, 23 km from the homestay, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Read less

name: Janeiro Hotel
address: Avenida Delfim Moreira, 696, Rio de Janeiro 22441-000
description: Soaking up the breeze, right bang smack on the sand, arms flung wide open to the Atlantic, this is JANEIRO. Located in the middle of Leblon's marvellous beach-culture, we bring Rio's bossa vibe to life. Nature is a joyful accomplice. And what about that view? The Cagarras islands scatter across a horizon blue as far as the eye can see. No make-believe needed here. At night, the Moon beams, and in the distance, the lights of Vidigal glitter and dance like fireflies. Pure poetry for the eyes, woven into the urban effervescence of the city. The barefoot simplicity of the beach finds its way into the smallest of details; from the rooms to the food, the music to the art, all is an extension of the golden sands out front. We sway to no other rhythm but Rio's.iHotelier/iStay

name: Casajomo Art & Food B&b
address: 136 R. Laurinda Santos Lôbo, Rio de Janeiro 20240-270
description: CasaJOMO Art & Food B&B is situated in Rio de Janeiro and has a rooftop pool and mountain views. The property features pool and garden views, and is 1.6 km from Escadaria Selarón. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes, units at the bed and breakfast also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and pancakes are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. At casaJOMO Art & Food B&B, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner and specialises in African cuisine. A variety of wellness packages are available for guests to get rejuvenated in-house. Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy walking tours nearby, or make the most of the garden. Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro is 3.2 km from casaJOMO Art & Food B&B, while Modern Art Museum is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont, 4 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Linx Galeão
address: Avenida 20 de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro 21941-900
description: Conveniently located only 500 m from Galeão - Tom Jobim International Airport in Rio de Janeiro, Linx Hotel has a 24-hour gym, pool and a bar. It is 15 km from central Rio. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a 32" LED TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hot shower. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional and international specialties, as well as a selection of drinks in the hotel’s restaurant. Linx Hotel International Airport Galeão also offers 24-hour free shuttle service and screens with flight hours. Guests can also benefit from the Mercato, a grab-and-go service for quick meals and snacks. It is set 17 km from Maracanã Stadium and 25 km from Copacabana.

name: Casa Tuxi
address: Rua Bambina 26, Rio de Janeiro 22251-050
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro, 700 metres from Botafogo´s tube station and the beach, Casa Tuxi features an outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site bistro. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room at this guest house is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. The property also offers a transfer service and a tour desk. Cristo Redentor Statue is 2.7 from Casa Tuxi, while the Sugar Loaf is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Pousadinha Copacabana
address: Rua Silva Castro 39, Rio de Janeiro
description: Offering a garden and quiet street view, Pousadinha Copacabana is situated in Rio de Janeiro, 700 metres from Copacabana Beach and 1.7 km from Leme Beach. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms. Fitted with a terrace, the accommodation offers air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. At the guest house, units include bed linen and towels. Diabo Beach is 2.9 km from the guest house, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 10 km from Pousadinha Copacabana.

name: Santo Mirante Hostel
address: Rua Dias de Barros 54 - Fundos, Rio de Janeiro 20241-020
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro, 2.1 km from Flamengo Beach, Santo Mirante Hostel provides air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. The property is set 5.3 km from AquaRio Rio Marine Aquarium, 6.3 km from Museum of Tomorrow and 6.8 km from Maracanã Stadium. Free WiFi and a shared kitchen are featured. All units at the hostel are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Santo Mirante Hostel include Escadaria Selarón, Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro and Modern Art Museum. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Reserva Pontal Beach
address: Estrada Do Pontal, 585 Bloco 1, Rio de Janeiro 22790-877
description: LUXURY APARTMENT FACING THE SEA OF RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES fully furnished with high quality furniture and utensils to offer maximum comfort to its guests. Full kitchen equipped with stainless steel stove, stainless refrigerator, stainless microwave oven, sandwich maker grill, espresso coffee maker, cold water filter, glassware, plates and cutlery, etc. Common Areas: Adult and Children's Pools Discovered, Cold Hydromassage, Hot Hydromassage, Sauna, Gourmet Space, Zen Space, Games Room, Gym, Elevator, Concierge, Children's Space, Etc.VRBO

name: Santa Vista Rio
address: Rua Dr. Júlio Otoni, 254, Rio de Janeiro 20241-400
description: On the Santa Teresa district, just a 20-minute drive from Botafogo Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Santa Vista Rio offers views of the Corcovado Christ Statue, Sugar Loaf Mountain and Guanabara Bay. It has free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool. The rooms at the Santa Vista Rio have a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a seating area and are equipped with air conditioning. Some categories offer a spa bath. Guests can relax by the outdoor swimming pool, which offers ocean and mountain views. The hotel is 10 minutes' drive from Maracanã Stadium and 8 km from Copacabana Beach.
